document.full_text: new jersey governor chris christie, a tough talking school reformer, said on friday that even a hint of compromise from the state teachers union could turn him into mr. nice guy.
document.title: new jersey's christie to teachers: i could be mr. nice guy
lines_and_colors: new jersey governor chris christie, a tough talking school reformer, said on friday that even a hint of compromise from the state teachers union could turn him into mr. nice guy.
